title: The Six Types of Working Genius with Patrick Lencioni
description:
Podcast family, we have something very special for you on the podcast this week! We are joined by our good friend Patrick Lencioni, founder of The Table Group and author of the upcoming book The Six Types of Working Genius.

In this episode, Pat talks about the new assessment that his team has created, titled after the upcoming book. John took this assessment, and Patrick walks through John’s results and shows how valuable this insight is to any leader who takes the assessment. Patrick’s team is generously offering this assessment for 50% off for our podcast listeners. Be sure to listen and learn how you can take this valuable assessment!

Our BONUS resource for this episode is the Working Genius Worksheet, which includes fill-in-the-blank notes from John and Patrick’s conversation. You can download the worksheet by visiting MaxwellPodcast.com/WorkingGenius and clicking “Download the Bonus Resource.”

References:

Take The Six Types of Working Genius Assessment

The Advantage by Patrick Lencioni

The 15 Invaluable Laws of Growth by John C. Maxwell

The 21 Irrefutable Laws of Leadership by John C. Maxwell

The John Maxwell Online Store
